participant_1.background:
I like to take my time getting ready in the morning, then grab a quick coffee and head out on my daily drive.
I do laundry once a week to keep my home clean and tidy.
i am a nurse and work in an emergency room at a busy hospital.
i like going barefoot.
sometimes , people worry i am crazy.

participant_2.background:
I love cooking, and Thai food is my favorite to cook.
i recently broke up with my girlfriend.
I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten.
I am close to my family as we have always been there for each other.
I prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch my foreign films without interruption.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do to relax after a long day?
I like to watch foreign films. I recently watched a great Thai horror film.
Interesting! I've never been a big fan of horror films.
What kind of films do you like to watch?
I'm a big fan of comedies. I also like to watch action films.
I love comedies too! I feel like I need to laugh after a long day of work.
I know what you mean. I also like to watch action films to get my adrenaline pumping.
Do you have any favorite movies?
I have a lot of favorite movies, but some of my favorites are The Princess Bride, The Shawshank Redemption, and The Dark Knight.
Those are all great movies! I love The Princess Bride.
It's so good! I could watch it over and over again.
Me too! It's one of my comfort movies.
What is your favorite comfort movie?
I think my favorite comfort movie is The Holiday.
That's a good choice! I love that movie too.
It is! I love the ending.
